ch0090_90_daigo/0101_0701_01_10:
Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Having trouble
deciding what to do today?
ch0090_90_daigo/0101_0701_02_10:
Just trust your gut, and do whatever you think
is right.
ch0090_90_daigo/7101_0701_01_10:
There’s no limit to the potential of both people and
Pokémon.
ch0090_90_daigo/7101_0701_02_10:
Now that I’ve awakened to this new power,
I realize that more than ever.
ch0090_90_daigo/7101_0701_03_10:
I wonder how far we can keep deepening our
potential...
ch0090_90_daigo/7101_0701_04_10: Just thinking about it is exciting, isn’t it?
ch0090_90_daigo/7102_0701_01_10:
I’m honored to have witnessed the discovery of a
new kind of stone here on Pasio.
ch0090_90_daigo/7102_0701_02_10:
It seems like this world still holds many more
mysteries and surprises that we don’t know about.
ch0090_90_daigo/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m not as knowledgeable as Cynthia, but I know
a bit about ruins and things myself.
ch0090_90_daigo/7103_0701_02_10:
I often visit places like that when I’m out stone
hunting.
ch0090_90_daigo/7104_0701_01_10:
Sync stones ultimate are so pure and sublime...
They shine with an almost divine light.
ch0090_90_daigo/7104_0701_02_10:
I’m just a little sad that I can’t get a good look at
this one now that it’s been built into my
Poryphone.
ch0090_90_daigo/7105_0701_01_10:
Sync stones ultimate give off a marvelous shine,
but that doesn’t necessarily mean that they’re
better than everything else.
ch0090_90_daigo/7105_0701_02_10:
All people and Pokémon have their own sparkle
and their own charm.
ch0090_90_daigo/7105_0701_03_10:
And your heart has its own shine too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]. Treasure it!
ch0090_90_daigo/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are. I have a present for you.
ch0090_90_daigo/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m sure you’re good at using items to their best
effect!
ch0090_90_daigo/2501_0701_01_10:
My transformation into the arc suit kind of reminds
me of Metagross’s Mega Evolution.
ch0090_90_daigo/2501_0701_02_10:
I can feel the synchrony between us as a sync
pair!
ch0090_90_daigo/2501_0702_01_10: The fact that it’s temporary is the same, too.
ch0090_90_daigo/2501_0702_02_10:
It’s like having an ace up your sleeve, and the
trick is knowing the right time to use it.
ch0090_90_daigo/2511_0701_01_10:
Seeing Metagross shining more brightly than ever
before...
ch0090_90_daigo/2511_0701_02_10:
has acted as an explosive boost to my passion for
both Steel-type Pokémon and rare stones!
ch0090_90_daigo/2511_0701_03_10:
It seems that the sync stone ultimate has filled
even my own heart with a joyous shine.
ch0090_90_daigo/2511_0702_01_10:
Whenever you’re passionate about something, your
life shines brilliantly!
ch0090_90_daigo/2511_0702_02_10:
And it becomes the motivation that always keeps
pushing you forward!
ch0090_90_daigo/3001_0701_01_10:
Metagross and I have been burning with fighting
spirit all morning!
ch0090_90_daigo/3003_0701_01_10:
If you don’t have any plans later, how about we
go stone hunting?
ch0090_90_daigo/3005_0701_01_10:
All those shining stars at night are the stones I’ll
never get to know...
